name: OldSchoolReaper
description:
How To Play: 

WASD - movement

Space - Jump (can double jump)

Left Shift - Dash forward

Right Mouse Button - Swing Cyber Scythe

Left Mouse Button - Summon Cyber Shield

-The game plays like a bullet hell. Swing your scythe at the right moment to deflect incoming pong balls back at the paddles (kinda like fighting a ghast in minecraft). 

-Player will take damage upon being hit by a ball, unless that player is blocking. There are two stamina bars at the bottom of the screen, one for dashing, and one for blocking.

Be careful though, the more damage you do, the harder the boss becomes. Get PONG's health bar to zero to eliminate it from the popularity charts and prove once and for all that your company's AAA games are superior.
